meanings.definition: A Buddhist community of monks and nuns.
meanings.sent1: The sanghas in the temple meditated together.
meanings.sent2: The local sanghas gathered to discuss their teachings.
meanings.sent3: The sanghas decided to have a potluck to share their favorite foods.
meanings.sent4: The unity within the sanghas was as strong as the roots of a tree.
meanings.sent5: The peaceful aura of the sanghas enveloped the entire monastery.

meanings.definition: A gathering or assembly of people for a common purpose.
meanings.sent1: The sanghas of volunteers cleaned up the park.
meanings.sent2: The sanghas of students protested for better school facilities.
meanings.sent3: The sanghas of friends organized a surprise birthday party.
meanings.sent4: The sanghas of athletes worked together like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The sanghas of musicians created beautiful harmonies during the concert.
